an4.53:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā antarā ca madhuraṃ antarā ca verañjaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.53:4.2: Sambahulāpi kho gahapatī ca gahapatāniyo ca antarā ca madhuraṃ antarā ca verañjaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
an4.53:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle () nisīdi.
an4.53:4.4: Addasaṃsu kho gahapatī ca gahapatāniyo ca bhagavantaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ.
an4.53:4.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te gahapatī ca gahapatāniyo ca bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.53:5.3: Chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati, devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
an4.53:6.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
an4.53:6.2: Idha, gahapatayo, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātī adinnādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī dussīlo pāpadhammo maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
an4.53:6.3: bhariyāpissa hoti pāṇātipātinī adinnādāyinī kāmesumicchācārinī musāvādinī surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinī dussīlā pāpadhammā maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
an4.53:6.4: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
an4.53:7.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
an4.53:7.2: Idha, gahapatayo, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātī adinnādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī dussīlo pāpadhammo maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
an4.53:7.3: bhariyā khvassa hoti pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā adinnādānā paṭiviratā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā musāvādā paṭiviratā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
an4.53:7.4: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
an4.53:8.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
an4.53:8.2: Idha, gahapatayo, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātā paṭivirato adinnādānā paṭivirato kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato musāvādā paṭivirato surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
an4.53:8.3: bhariyā khvassa hoti pāṇātipātinī … pe … surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinī dussīlā pāpadhammā maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
an4.53:8.4: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
an4.53:9.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
an4.53:9.2: Idha, gahapatayo, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātā paṭivirato … pe … sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
an4.53:9.3: bhariyāpissa hoti pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā … pe … surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
an4.53:9.4: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
